channel.title: Editing the buttons on your client?
channel.description: How would i change what the buttons look like on my client, the ones that say log in and about.. I have sprites.

item.title: Editing the buttons on your client?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if ur talking about the pics on the side…then just gt a pic and make it the size the other 1st are and save it as EXACTLLY same name…check if there are daouble and replace it with urs…compile>run

item.title: Editing the buttons on your client?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I turn to this in my client.java:

int i1 = c / 2 - 80; int l1 = c1 / 2 + 50; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_967.method361(i1 - 73, 16083, l1 - 20); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, i1, anInt939, "Login", l1 + 5, true);

I was looking around in my Class_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 and I found this which you might want to take a look it.

public void method361(int i, int j, int k) { i += anInt1454; k += anInt1455; int l = i + k * Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1379; int i1 = 0; if(j != 16083) return; int j1 = anInt1453; int k1 = anInt1452; int l1 = Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1379 - k1; int i2 = 0; if(k < Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1381) { int j2 = Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1381 - k; j1 -= j2; k = Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1381; i1 += j2 * k1; l += j2 * Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1379; } if(k + j1 > Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1382) j1 -= (k + j1) - Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1382; if(i < Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1383) { int k2 = Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1383 - i; k1 -= k2; i = Class30_Sub2_Sub1.anInt1383; i1 += k2; l += k2; i2 += k2; l1 += k2; }

Basically look anywhere around in those two files. This is far as my mind takes me.
